name: Ola Maps
description: Real-time navigation and mapping service with precise routing and location search for Indian roads

opengraph.title: Ola Maps - AI-Powered Maps, Geocoding API & Directions for India
opengraph.description: Discover Ola Maps, offering real-time map directions, geocoding APIs, and street view tailored for India’s roads. Seamlessly integrate location mapping and routing with our Maps API and SDKs for iOS, Android, and web platforms. Optimize your journeys with accurate location maps and advanced geocoding features.
